text: The Bambale Koli, or Bamble Koli is a clan of Koli caste found in the Indian state of Maharashtra. Bambale Kolis served in Maratha Empire and were received the grants of the Jagirs by Peshwa Madhavrao I in 1769 - 70. Bambale Kolis served at good positions Such as Patil, Mansabdar and Nayak in Maratha Empire. == Notable == * Javji Bamble, Mansabdar of Rajur == References == Category:Koli clans
title: Bambale Kolis
